name: Rudawful
description:
Dodge obstacles as Rudolph while munching on as many carrots as you can find to avoid running out of energy.  Compete on the leader boards for the fastest completion times in each level! 

CONTROLS:

Mouse to move,  ESC to pause, hold left shift to boost (go faster but use more energy)

Made in one week for the GDS winter game jam 2022: https://itch.io/jam/gds-winter-game-jam-2022

(the jam lasted a month... so I procrastinated)
